nodes.text: Shield Securities was an organization active in the Core during the time of the Clone Wars. They supplied cam droids to the planets Chandrila and Alderaan, as well as to many parts of Coruscant, such as the Bonchaka, Neldiz, and F'tu manufacturing districts.

Shield Securities was a major company in the Core Worlds. Modified Sheild security cameras were involved in the use of a bioweapon created by Separatist scientist Lok Durd on the planet Chandrila during the Clone Wars. Because of the bioweapon attack, the other areas of the galaxy were all suspects for the next attack's location, until the stores of damotite used in the creation of the weapon were destroyed on Lanteeb.
